plot: When a video game princess crosses over into the real world, a geeky gamer is thrust into an epic suburban adventure.
plot_en: When a video game princess crosses over into the real world, a geeky gamer is thrust into an epic suburban adventure.
plot_es: When a video game princess crosses over into the real world, a geeky gamer is thrust into an epic suburban adventure.
title: A Good Knight's Quest
